name: CA EDD - SDI Main Line
notes: Automated system available 24/7 for claim status. Long hold times expected. For best results, practice the phone tree (takes ~90 seconds) and call 90 seconds before 8:00 AM, timing your representative request to arrive exactly at opening. Even with this strategy, expect 30+ minute hold times.

name: Oakland EDD Office
parkingInfo: Street parking available. Arrive early for spots.
notes: Closest office to OAK base. Ticket system - arrive before 9 AM.

name: Hayward EDD Office
notes: Alternative to Oakland office. May have shorter wait times.

name: EDD Online Services
notes: File claims, check status, upload documents, and manage your account online.

name: LTD Claims Administrator
notes: ⚠️ CBA Section 27.J references Aetna Life Insurance Company as administrator. However, some documentation references The Hartford. Contact FedEx Benefits Service Center (1-855-545-4748) or ALPA to verify the current LTD claims administrator before filing.

name: Aetna Life Insurance Company - Group Disability
notes: If Aetna is the current LTD administrator per CBA. Have your FedEx employee ID and claim number ready.

name: The Hartford - Group Benefits Claims
notes: Alternative LTD administrator contact. Verify current administrator with FedEx Benefits before calling. Have your FedEx employee ID and claim number ready.

name: The Hartford - Online Claims Portal
notes: If Hartford is the administrator. Register to track claim status and submit documents online.

name: Aetna - Online Claims Portal
notes: If Aetna is the administrator. Register to track claim status and submit documents online.

name: ALPA Retirement & Insurance Committee
notes: Contact for questions about benefit disputes and PBRB process.

name: ALPA - Air Line Pilots Association
notes: Main union website for resources and contacts.

name: FedEx Benefits Service Center
notes: For questions about FedEx benefits, sick bank, and leave policies.

name: FedEx Workday
notes: Access pay stubs, tax documents, and HR information.

name: Medical Board of California - License Lookup
notes: Verify your doctor's medical license is current before filing.

name: Pilot Administration Center (PAC)
address: 3620 Hacks Cross Road, Building B 3rd Floor
notes: Use as supervisor and for employment verification on SDI forms. PAC has access to payroll data that CA EDD requires. Note: PAC staff can be difficult to reach by phone; persistence may be required. Some pilots have also used their base assistant's contact information, though verify they have access to payroll records. CA EDD requests sent to FedEx payroll departments have historically experienced significant delays or no response.

name: FedEx Payroll - CA SDI Dept
notes: Address used by the payroll department to submit CA SDI payments.
